name: heracronite
effect: Held: Allows Heracross to Mega Evolve into Mega Heracross.
short_effect: Held: Allows Heracross to Mega Evolve into Mega Heracross.

flavor_text.x_y: One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones. Have Heracross hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
